name: Peanut Butter & Co., Inc.
description: Peanut Butter & Co., Inc. is a leading producer of premium peanut butter products, dedicated to providing consumers with high-quality, delicious, and healthy spreads. Founded in 1998 by Jason and Rebecca Reiner in New York City, the company has carved a niche in the specialty food market with its unique flavors and innovative product lines. Peanut Butter & Co. offers a range of peanut butter varieties, including classic creamy and crunchy options, as well as gourmet flavors like Dark Chocolate Dreams, Cinnamon Raisin Swirl, and White Chocolate Wonderful. The company focuses on using natural ingredients, ensuring that their products are not only tasty but also nutritious, free from artificial additives and preservatives. In addition to peanut butter, the company has expanded its offerings to include nut butters made from almond, cashew, and blended nut varieties. Peanut Butter & Co. is committed to sustainability, sourcing peanuts from responsible farmers and engaging in eco-friendly practices throughout its production process. The company also actively participates in community initiatives, supporting local food banks and health education programs. With a mission to inspire people to enjoy peanut butter in new and exciting ways, Peanut Butter & Co. continues to innovate and grow, bringing joy and health to its customers.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
